titleSection.name: OpsHub Integration Manager for VersionOne and Accept 360 Integration
titleSection.shortDescription: leverage existing requirements documentation and traceability, while adding the practice of agile project management

descriptionSection.description: Integrating VersionOne and Accept360 helps you leverage your existing tool chain and reach more people. This integration helps manage overlap between tools with a two-way flow of requirements so that teams can leverage existing requirements documentation and traceability, while adding the practice of agile project management.

commercial.shortDescription: The product is stable and supported.
